H0.text: Which cartoon character had the maiden name ‘Slaghoople’. Betty Rubble

H1.text: Which cartoon character had the maiden name ‘Slaghoople’. Jane Jetson

H2.text: Which cartoon character had the maiden name ‘Slaghoople’. Marge Simpson

H3.text: Which cartoon character had the maiden name ‘Slaghoople’. Wilma Pebble

A4.text: Later episodes and spin-offs say her maiden name is 'Slaghoople', based on the name of Wilma's mother in the original series, Pearl Slaghoople.
